about_the_game:
Latent Technology's first tech demo: a glimpse into the future of games. Step into a series of fully physical worlds powered by Generative Physics Animation technology, where characters' muscles are controlled by neural networks in real-time. Explore interactive environments where characters and objects respond dynamically to your presence.


Key features:

  • Fully physical interactions: interact with characters that move and respond realistically in real-time with their environment, adding depth to the world.

  • Real-time neural networks: dive into a future where neural networks drive the muscles of the characters in a fully responsive manner.

  • Relaxing exploration: no complex mechanics—just you, the world, and the joy of discovery :)

This isn’t about racing to the finish—it's about taking in the details and savoring the journey.

content_descriptors.notes: The castle scene allows players to be hit by arrows, showing blood.

detailed_description:
Latent Technology's first tech demo: a glimpse into the future of games. Step into a series of fully physical worlds powered by Generative Physics Animation technology, where characters' muscles are controlled by neural networks in real-time. Explore interactive environments where characters and objects respond dynamically to your presence.


Key features:

  • Fully physical interactions: interact with characters that move and respond realistically in real-time with their environment, adding depth to the world.

  • Real-time neural networks: dive into a future where neural networks drive the muscles of the characters in a fully responsive manner.

  • Relaxing exploration: no complex mechanics—just you, the world, and the joy of discovery :)

This isn’t about racing to the finish—it's about taking in the details and savoring the journey.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD R9 380 (4 GB VRAM)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 11.0 (Big Sur)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or Apple Silicon M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD R9 380 (4 GB VRAM)

name: Latent Experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel core i5-8400 / amd ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD R9 380 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Latent Technology's first tech demo. A journey through different worlds built with Generative Physics Animation technology, featuring, for the very first time, fully physical and interactive characters.
